Unfinished Area

This part of the website is unfinished. Sorry to leave you hanging. Please feel free to pick another route instead. Back to Beginning

Rah, after hearing your answer, sprints off into the woods. Surprised, you set off after him. As you run the trees fly past you. You two dodge bushes and rocks as you run through the woods. Not long into the forest, you reach what looks like a large stone box covered in leaves. It has intricate carvings of elaborate designs on it. Rah brushes away the plants revealing an odd stone treasure chest, worn from the elements, sitting patiently under the brush.

"Should we try to open it?" Rah asks smiling.

Yes No
